name: Scary Game
description:
=================================================

WELCOME TO YOUR DAYDREAM

=================================================

Scary Game is Interactive Choose Your Own Adventure game addressing and making light of the criticisms of horror stereotypes through the use of satire and cultural perspectives, while also addressing gender and race.

=================================================

YOU ARE THE PREY

=================================================

A brilliant blend of film and video game mediums. Experience a motion picture from a new perspective. Make the decisions, carve out your own path and survive he attacks from your somewhat unique dis-positioned predator. You got to act fast or he will get you.

=================================================

FEATURES

=================================================

ADVENTURE

INTERACTIVE STORY

HORROR

INTERDISCIPLINARY MEDIUMS

SATIRE

CINEMATIC PIECE
